content.subtitle: If Karma saw fit to drop a large metal meteorite on his head, I would argue that day should be made into an American holiday.

paragraphs.name: 9db6
paragraphs.text: At this point in the game, I only know Paul Ryan as the disingenuous republican troll who is only focused on providing more tax cuts for America’s upper class and has absolutely zero regret, remorse, or guilt about syphoning away millions of dollars away from tens of millions of America’s most needy along the way.

paragraphs.text: The GOP brass wants to repeal Obamacare because it will cut taxes to the wealthiest 1% — so what, they say, if 25 million people lose their health coverage.

paragraphs.name: e57b
paragraphs.text: It would appear that the best case scenario for the House Republicans is to quickly drop the flaming dog turd of a bill on the Senate door step and duck while running away in hopes they don’t get splattered by it when the Senate just as quickly kicks it back at them.

content.subtitle: This situation reminds me of this apropos quote, courtesy of Benjamin Franklin: “Any fool can criticize, condemn and complain and most…

paragraphs.name: cebe
paragraphs.text: The GOP had almost eight years to create a replacement for the A.C.A. — the fallout they’re experiencing is the fruit of their not very hard earned labors. Seriously, after eight years, Trumpcare was the Republicans’ best answer to repeal and replace the A.C.A.?

52c1d7c3bb9a.title: Trump had a running theme through his whole TV career- “Responsibility falls to the project manager…

paragraphs.name: 5f54
paragraphs.text: Trump had a running theme through his whole TV career- “Responsibility falls to the project manager”- the one who volunteered to steer the ship for the team. This is Trump’s fault- these dummies didn’t vote for Ryan. I can’t even fathom why anyone — even the dumbdumb Trump supporters — would now point the finger at anybody but the sociopath who sold them the package in the first place. Pretty dumb.

paragraphs.text: Poor baby. It’s HIS bill and as Speaker he needs to take responsibility for it and not try to shove it off on someone else.

paragraphs.text: When I hear “Health Savings Accounts” and tax breaks, I have to throw up. People that make 50 grand or less, which is about 85% of working folks, will never be able to save enough to cover serious illness. I had a heart…

60561ff57aa5.title: Let’s call this what it is.

content.subtitle: He’s fulfilling a lifelong dream — Throwing the elderly off healthcare so that they will die earlier and won’t be a drain on Social…

paragraphs.name: f4df
paragraphs.text: Let’s call this what it is. It’s Ryan’s LES for MOR plan — Life Expectancy Reduction for Many Older Residents.

paragraphs.name: bced
paragraphs.text: He’s fulfilling a lifelong dream — Throwing the elderly off healthcare so that they will die earlier and won’t be a drain on Social Security and Medicare. He’s an unrepenting bastard who sold his soul to the Koch brothers long ago.

paragraphs.name: 9ae2
paragraphs.text: Too bad, Ryan. You chose to waffle and equivocate over Dumpster all during the election. He’s the scorpion to your frog and so don’t act surprised he’s got his stinger in your back while you’re carrying him across the river.

e14d353b07c.title: Here’s the thing: People have been saying for years what a genius Ryan is.

paragraphs.name: 6dd9
paragraphs.text: Here’s the thing: People have been saying for years what a genius Ryan is. Yet, he’s never done anything to warrant such praise. Everything he proposes turns out to be garbage. Perhaps he’s the best the party of Illness, Illiteracy, Poverty, and Pollution has, but, man, that’s not saying much.

69cccd1073b0.title: Since these bickering children are supposed to be running our government, let’s end the debate.

paragraphs.name: 067e
paragraphs.text: Since these bickering children are supposed to be running our government, let’s end the debate. We can just all agree that every Republican is responsible for this cynical, worthless pile of crap.
